body.name: Swipe Right for Romance (A Love Bug Novel Book 1)

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #10,238 in Kindle Store (See Top 100 in Kindle Store) #73 in Fiction Satire #74 in General Humorous Fiction #661 in Romantic Comedy (Kindle Store)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love is Quirky
reviews.reviewText: AJ doesn’t believe in love. Julie is a hopelessly romantic with her own ideals of love. Completely opposite in life they somehow find each other in an unusual way. I always say opposite attract but this pair is above that and more. Take a ride with AJ and Julie as you discover laughter, love, and pair not looking but find each other irritating and irresistible. Definitely a good read!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adorable, entertaining spin on world of dating apps
reviews.reviewText: Dating apps are rough. I met my ex-fiancé on one and I have zero interest in getting back on them anytime soon, if at all. Swipe Right for Romance takes the world of dating apps and puts an adorable, entertaining spin on them. I loved the references to classic romcoms like Pretty Woman, Notting Hill, and Sleepless in Seattle. Junie gave me major Phoebe Buffay from Friends vibes with her eccentric fashion choices and quirky personality and I loved how hard AJ fell for her despite being such opposites. Read if you like dual POV, fake dating, opposites attract, grumpy/sunshine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I absolutely loved this one
reviews.reviewText: I love my romcoms but this was even better than I expected. It's an opposites attract fake dating romcom with the back drop of a a startup dating app.It is truly laugh out loud. There is this scene when they are at their first fake date, WITH HIS MOTHER, and the female MC mentions meeting when they grabbed the same book. The book literally had me LOLing, let's just say it's not something for mom's ears. #iykyk and if you don't know, this book is worth reading for that scene alone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: AJ is a rich tech investor, and Junie & her partner Liv have a new dating app, different from others. After earning a shot at financing, disaster strikes & threatens the apps viability. Meanwhile, Julie’s profile is matching her to AJ, an unlikely match at first glance. A fun romp thru the trials of daring, & finding love where it’s least expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Junie was a hoot! AJ was a little tense and uptight! But they created some awesome sparks! I enjoyed their journey!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A funny story, two people who are more opposite than alike. Their back and forth banter is undeniable. Full of laughter, fun, drama and ❤️ love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This book make me giddy, I enjoyed this Rom Com!
reviews.reviewText: This book made me giddy, the myriad of metaphors, puns, and 80/90’s movie references so nicely referenced by the author were giving me all the feels. 𝘗𝘳𝘦𝘵𝘵𝘺 𝘞𝘰𝘮𝘢𝘯, 𝘞𝘩𝘦𝘯 𝘏𝘢𝘳𝘳𝘺 𝘔𝘦𝘵 𝘚𝘢𝘭𝘭𝘺, 𝘚𝘭𝘦𝘦𝘱𝘭𝘦𝘴𝘴 𝘪𝘯 𝘚𝘦𝘢𝘵𝘵𝘭𝘦, 𝘗𝘳𝘦𝘵𝘵𝘺 𝘪𝘯 𝘗𝘪𝘯𝘬, 𝘕𝘰𝘵𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘏𝘪𝘭𝘭..☺️ what’s more the message in this story is a reminder that imperfections make us unique and interesting and to ultimately always be true to yourself.If you like dual pov, short chapters, fake dating, and a dash of humor then book 1 in the Love Bug series Swipe Right for Romance by Kelly Collins will be a delight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Think HBOnly Romantic Comedy Feature
reviews.reviewText: With a wonderful twist on the typical Billionaire Trope, this book is a must read for any Rom Com fan who is looking for more than just a few good laughs.This book was the perfect blend of Ha Ha Comedy and Ah Ha Novel. I love a good side aching rom com, and this book's wonderful meet cute truly sets that stage, but it has so much more with its comic tone that left me smiling throughout the book and presented me with many wonderfully humorous and insightful lines. AJ and Junie will steal your heart and their story is something right out off the silver screen. With wonderfully paced action that never misses a comic beat and dialogue that simmers with tension and banter, AJ and Junie's story will stay with you long after you close the book. Also, I can't say enough about the secondary characters like Henry, Olivia, and Maxine, AJs Mom, who were as carefully written and real as the main characters themselves! I am thrilled to see this is the start of a new series and I will be there for the Olivia's story as soon as it is available!Just a little teaser of what you will find“Think of yourself [Junie] as a rare gem. Not quite a pink diamond, mind you.... But something like an alexandrite—complex, shifting, requiring the right light to truly shine. AJ can be your light.”"I am not a priceless stone coveted by the world.”“He believes you are.” Maxine gazes into my eyes, searching for something only she knows. “More importantly though, you have to believe it. Set the standard for how people treat you. Don’t be a pearl when you can be a diamond.”💖That last line IS this book in a nutshell! 💖

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Well romance isn't dead just taking a break, a romance for the ages, apps included, a sweet story which I thoroughly enjoyed, would highly recommend for those who want a meet cute story and blossoming romance through the following weeks, well written, characters are well thought out and bounce off each other really well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a standalone opposites attract rom-com.When Junie enters her Love Bug app into a contest run by AJ's company, they meet and have an instant attraction. There is an element of fake dating, but I don't think anyone truly believes they are fake.I loved Junie, she was sassy, quirky, klutzy, funny and unapologetically her - she didn't change or adapt for anyone she knew what she wanted and went for it. AJ was more reserved, he clearly wanted someone to fall in love with but hated the dating apps from past experience.I enjoyed reading about Junie, she was the complete opposite of AJ and they complimented each other - there were lots of funny moments between them. The concept of the app was intriguing, having a different kind of connection before meeting was fun to read.My only bug-bear is with AJ being so professional I couldn't understand why he was so OK with dating someone in the competition, surely it would have caused instant problems with all the other competitors - the issue is irrelevant towards the end, but I kept thinking all the other competitors would have not been happy at all.- standalone- rom-com- opposites attract- fake relationship- grumpy / sunshine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Totally different but loved the story all the same. Loved how it ended and can't wait to read the chapter in the bonus sign up. Can't wait to get my hands on it. Highly recommend to read for a quick love story with HEA

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A lovely romantic story about AJ and Junie, very funny in parts, well worth the read. I have loved all of Kelly’s books especially the Aspen Cove series.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend and you won’t be disappointed. Such a fun read and the way to love can be exciting to do
